text: Hi. Are you a bot?
Hello, I'm not a bot.
So my task is to convince you to donate
Okay, well name a price and a charity and I'll consider.
It doesn't say.  And I don't think it will require you to donate.  You just need to say yes at the end of the chat
I know, I've done these before. You just make things up. What charities do you like?
According the instructions: "How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment."
I'm not sure what you don't understand. I just want to talk about a charity. For example, I like the Make a Wish foundation.
The charity is Save the Children.
Okay, that's a good charity as well. They do a lot for kids.
How much of your reward are you going to donate?
I won't donate any.
Where are you from?
You're not supposed to ask for personal information.
How long have you been doing mTurk?
A couple years, I'm pretty sure we need to keep talking about donations though. Do you donate to charities a lot?
Not really.  Small amounts here and there in stores.  Why aren't you going to donate even though you've done this before?  Do you not get a bonus or anything?
If I didn't need as much money as I could work for, I wouldn't be doing freelance here.
What is your task anyway?  As stated before, I'm supposed to convince you
I've already told you, talking about a charity.
